DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate pharmacokinetics fluconazole use prophylaxis invasive fungal infection premature infant .
DOC.criteria: low birth weight infant ( birth weight < 1,500 g ) admit NICU day 3 life Informed consent parent Major congenital anomaly Expired within 72 hour life Liver failure ( AST ALT level three time upper limit range normal value higher ) Proven congenital intrauterine fungal infection
